div.p: This section will show you how to set up your host and target systems. The target needs a custom Yocto Project*-based image containing Intel® VTune™ Profiler drivers and Intel® Time Coordinated Computing Tools (Intel® TCC Tools) layer.

note.p: For this release, you must build the image from scratch per the instructions in this section.

div.p: Use the navigation menu to the left to begin, starting with Prerequisites.
